27.description: BLOWING OR DRIFTING SNOW OR SAND

33.description: Fog or ice fog, no appreciable change during the past hour

34.description: Fog or ice fog, has begun or become thicker during the past hour

68.description: Rain (or drizzle) and snow, moderate or heavy

83.description: Rain shower(s) or intermittent rain, heavy

84.description: Rain shower(s) or intermittent rain, violent

01.description: Clouds generally dissolving or becoming less developed during the past hour

02.description: State of sky on the whole unchanged during the past hour

03.description: Clouds generally forming or developing during the past hour
